metadata.title: CVE-2015-3200 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: mod_auth in lighttpd before 1.4.36 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary log entries via a basic HTTP authentication string without a colon character, as demonstrated by a string containing a NULL and new line character.

criterions.comment: lighttpd package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.45-1ubuntu3').
